text:
Yaad h first year m nikhil ko saath m consultation dete h and wo hamari maar leta tha.
Kitne courses saath m chaape m, all thanks you to (& none to modi).
Your hairstyle was the best I have ever seen!
Wo ganga bairaj ki cycle trip, waha jake dekha to pata chala kitna â€œbeautifulâ€ h wo.
We should be proud to have completed successful & safe COLLEGE GOA TRIP. Tere daaru peene ka sapna bhi pura ho gaya.
Trip ka best to KAYAKI hi tha! LOL!
And I confess ki â€œCasino na jaane ka reason tum nahi theâ€! Tumhari umar thi! LMAO!
Quarantine m bulla kata h tumne covid +ve bande ke saath, still you tested -ve, tum strong ho.
Bohot chapa h tumne, club m, acads m, placement m and aage bhi chapoge.
Joining se pehle DL bana lena, warna Jaguar chalane nahi milegi.
PS: Agle trip pe tab jayenge, jab tum OVER-21 ho jaoge!
author: Aditya  Raghuwanshi

text:
Ye memoir mene pence ke memoir m add kiya tha, ab yaha ctrl+v kar deta hu!

Sir apne bhot help kari h, especially last sem m hume padayi se mukt kar diya. AE462 se saare tasks kar diye, AE451A m reports, acoustics m to pura midsem & assign, and much more.
A* aa gaya apki kripa se ek course m!
Waiting for tumhare prof banne ka & replacing DK Giri asap. Meri taraf se tumhari ek treat pending h!
author: Aditya  Raghuwanshi

text:
Tere jitna lamba memoir nahi likh paaunga, itni BT 1 din m handle nhi hogi!
First we met in the triple room, aur tumne kaha tha â€œmein bahubaliâ€. We were the only â€œaero guysâ€ in the wing. Tumse bheek mangta tha ki mere liye ruk jana HSS ke baad kyunki mujhe TA101 ki lab ka rasta yaad nahi tha (aaj bhi nahi h)!
First antaragni m hospi m gadde uth vaye h uss totle sahil ne, but tu uska favourite tha, tumko to daaru bhi offer ki thi usne!
Pehlie antaragni m bandi search kar rahe the saath m, tumhare baap se tips bhi li thi, but jab end m kuch nhi hua to saath m raat bhar pura campus ghume the saari raat!
Yaad h wo first year endsem ki raat hum poore campus m ghum rahe the padne ki jagah ke liye, jab hum apne â€œbhutiyaâ€ departmental building gaye the!
â€œ2 days exercise krta hu to pett andar ho jata hâ€, â€œjo ladkiyo se baat krte h wo virgin nahi hoteâ€, â€œJab fever aaye to khelna chahiye, fever chale jata hâ€, I said m covid +ve hu you said â€œtheek hai, apna trimmer de janaâ€!
Esse na jane kitne â€œspecialâ€ statements bataye h tumne!
Kotana se kitni treats nikali h humne, dabbe ki, uske charge ki, pre-birthday treat! LOL!
You said ki â€œGraduate hone ke baad hi peena shuru karunga!â€, LOL!

You worked hard in the aeromodelling club, from summer project to secy, from secy to cordi!
Fir life m ek nibbi aayi jisne tumhare raato ki neend aur din ka chain udaa diya!
Tumne uske liye sabke against jaake secy banaya, took care of here, (expensive) gifts diye!
Padne ka mann nahi hota tha exams ke time, usko uthane ke liye khud subah jaldi uthte the tum!
Aur hua kya â€¦ L*** lagye gaye! Oooooo! L*** lag gayeeeee! LMAO!
Double katwaya h tumne, but important life lesson de gayi wo!

Humne Sacred Games ka second season puri raat binge watch kiya tha!
Humne GOT season 8 ka pura saath dekha h, jo bekar tha!
Placements ke wo stressful moments, jab lagta tha ki placement hi nahi lagegi!
HSBC ka puri raat test diya tha, fir interview bhi nahi ho paya!
Placement hone ke baad to saatve asmaan pe the sab, sabko tips baat rahe the!
Mere saath room pe baith ke presentation de raha tha jab m covid +ve tha!
2 baar covid +ve bande ke MOST PRIMARY contact hone ke baad bhi kuch nahi hua, apne blood se vaccine banao, named â€œBahubaliâ€.
End m hum 32 days campus m aaye the, jisme 22 days m quarantine tha, but those 10 days were the best days of my college!
[DOGE ne bhot time kharab kiya h, abhi check kar gir gaya h!]
Baaki tum hi hitesh & pushpa ka relationship bacha skte ho, keep helping them! LOL!
First time jab tumhara number save kiya tha tab â€œamendraâ€ naam se save kiya tha, aaj bhi wese h, aage bhi wesa hi rahega!
You were the guy jiske bharose m hamesha reh skta h, for any help! Sab esse friends nhi hote!
PS: Naak mein nimbu nichod lena, corona bhaag jayega!
[Tere se lamba likh diya mene]
author: Aditya  Raghuwanshi

text:
Tumhe kya bolu, â€œaniketâ€ or â€œpoomaâ€ or â€œprecious bhaiâ€. Each name has a different story and memory behind it.
Kachodi khane hoti h to breakfast krte ho, warna seedha lunch!
Coding, khana and sona are your best three things (probably)!
Second antaragni m hum dono shankar mahadevan ke show m 30 min pehle pahnche the, no line m wait karna, no raste m bheed, seedha andar gaye & enjoy kiya tha!
Jab hum tumhara cooler lekar aaye the & tumne apne mask se apna paseena saaf kiya tha, waah dil se awaz aayi thi ki #$%^
Frisbee khelne m bohot hardwork kiya h tumne, thode dinn aur khel lete to slim trim ho jate!
Tumhare famous nipple pose ki photo padi h mere paas, kuch time m public kar dunga!
Your room was our â€œbullaâ€ space! Bade discussions hue h waha!
â€œLa mejor de las suertes para el futuroâ€! Google it! Thodi mehnat karo mere memoir m!
author: Aditya  Raghuwanshi

text:
Lucknowie aur kanpuria wese hi bhai hote h, baap same hone ki jarurat nahi!
Par tumhari wo â€œnasheeli aankheâ€ wo kuch alag h!
Summer wo MSO201A yaad aur regret rahega! (BC ne credits nhi diye)
Ham kai baar saath padne jate the, ek baar exams ke time library gaye the and sab waha IPL dekhe chilla rahe the! Bhaga diya tha logo ko!
Hum log jab devashish se negotiation kar rahe the, protien powder ka mess m, fir wo tumhare room pe aa jata tha!
Tera stamina unlimited h, football m anshuman ko chor do bhagte rehta h pure time!
Abhi to lamba WFH chalega, kanpur bagal m hi h, samajh rahe ho na!
author: Aditya  Raghuwanshi

text:
Apalyala DOPA banavine ha sarvata vaita nirnaya hota. Apana attaca prayatna karu sakata.
Kanapura 3.25 Varse jagalyanantara, majha asa andaja ahe ki tumhi ata visvasa thevala ahe ki uttara pradesatila sarva loka gunda nasatata ani tumhi suruvaticya apeksepeksa kahi cangale hote.
Apana adyapa svata: La Manchester United â€‹â€‹prasansaka mhanuna sambodhata ahata ya drdha niscayace mi kautuka karato! [Lavakaraca mi tya vargata samavista hoila!]
Apana ataparyanta utkrsta kamagiri keli ahe, ani mala mahita ahe ki karata rahanara (kahi klista resa)
amhi samparkata raha!
PS: Report to google translator for any mistakes.
author: Aditya  Raghuwanshi

text:
DISCLAIMER: Saare wing wale tumhe memoir m â€œpariâ€ bolenge, m nahi bol raha!
Yaar dange ne kyu nahi banaya account yearbook ke liye!
Tum dono ke liye saath m likhta memoir acha sa!
Best part of the Goa trip was â€œThe Churchâ€, kayaki se zayada fun hue waha, oh sorry, tum nahi the waha! LOL!
Thanks to your contribution apni wing paint karne ke liye!
You have a good dressing sense, sabh log goa trip pe tumse hi puch rahe the â€œye pehnu ya ye?â€
I donâ€™t think ab tak tumhari GPL hui h!
PS: Abhi to time h, One Night Ultimate Wolf khelte h!
author: Aditya  Raghuwanshi

text:
I sure remember our FIFA nights.
Pehle m tumse better tha, but fir tum practice kar karke aage nikal gaye.
Man United se bhi hara diya tha tumne! LOL

Had many great & long discussions about football with you!
Ek baar football match nhi khel paye phatta ground pe, will regret that! (FIFA toh online bhi khel lenge)
Papa Perez ko tum hi replace karoge!
Ek dusre troll hum life long karenge, ye hamare rivalry ka adhikaar h!
author: Aditya  Raghuwanshi

text:
Sabse underrated londa h tu. Tumne acads m chapa, club m chapa, placement m chapa, bus single reh gaya. Chal wo to hum bhi reh gaye. Par tumne kabhi try nhi kiya warna pakka pata lete.
[Par inn 4 saalo m tumhari japanese samajhna seekh gaye.]
Hitesh ko horror movies dekhne m bilkul darr nahi lagta.
Hitesh is such a nice guy, sabko help karta h, paise maango to mana nhi karta & wapis bhi nhi maangta h, har baar treat deta h, mess m apna extras dusro ko deta h!
Tumne najane kitne seniors ko stalk kiya h (like Anshul) and usne learn krke chapa h!
Tumhari fluent english ne ek unique â€œexpressionâ€ bana diya h tumhara!
Rich to tum banne wale ho, itne saare DOGE khareed khareed ke! Thoda hume bhi baat dena!
We know tumhe exercise kitni pasand h, tabhi tum 6 baje hamare saath PE ground jate the!

PS: Ye pura memoir sarcastic h, jitna pada h uska opposite karlo! LOL!

author: Aditya  Raghuwanshi

text:
Tumhe yaad nahi hoga, but first baat hamari 1st year m hui thi jab m NCC m tha and tum senator the call pe. Tab nhi pata tha itni masti karne wale h hum log.
Tumne to group â€œAAAPâ€ ka nirman kiya. Tumne 1 din pehle DK Giri ke course ka code likha tha, ussi ko present krke pass hue h. Humne kamle ki kitni bitching kari h and Mariappan ke course m A* le aaye! Bhot chapa h tumne in everything you were involved in, aur aage bhi chapoge! Be in touch!

Abhijeet â€œSirâ€ ne account nahi banaya to unka yahi likh deta hu -
Sir ne bhot help kari h, especially last sem m hume padayi se mukt kar diya. AE462 se saare tasks kar diye, AE451A m reports, acoustics m to pura midsem & assign, and much more.
Waiting for tumhare prof banne ka & replacing DK Giri asap. Meri taraf se tumhari ek treat pending h!
author: Aditya  Raghuwanshi

text:
Wo pehla din, hum first row m the PHY101 ke course m, aiming to get a dassa!
Now we are happy after dropping CE643 kyunki endsem nhi dena tha!
You got the best roommate and the best brother of all! Sab ek se ek namoone h (including you)
Humne kitne course saath m kiye h, psy, ESOs, TAs, etc.
With you in courses, it feels like beda paar ho jayega (with abhay itâ€™s the opposite)
I was sadly *not* the part of the squad, jinhe tumhara haath toda tha!
Thanks to you our GOA trip was successful (without being drunk)! Tere left-right ke confusion se apni road trip bhi lambi ho gayi!
You changed the most, from maggu to bas pass hona h! I think you got the most undeserving field (mech), but koi na you tackled all the hurdles, did open mic, poetry, E-Cell m chapa, handball and much more.
You grown a lot, both skill wise & physically ğŸ˜‚
Movie likha to romantic mat likhna, bcoz tumhare script m wo wale **scenes** nahi honge!
You were a courageous one, who is following his dream whole heartedly!
PS: Vadhati rakho mota bhai
[Tumhare oppo reno se yearbook DP mil gayi, thnxx]
author: Aditya  Raghuwanshi

text:
Tumhe to mera copycat bolte h! Same jacket bhi hai apan ke paas!
Badi dardnaak GPL di h tumne sabko (lekin param reh gaya)
Tum personality wise kafi strong ho aur jab darr lagta h to show nahi karte! 
Yaad h jab tum quarantine m the, tum mujhse symptoms puch rahe the, mein kehta tha chill maar kuch nahi h aur tum kehte h â€œdarr nahi raha h mein, m to sirf puch raha huâ€, aur fir bolte the arre â€œmera pulse rate 105 tha, khada hua to 110 ho gayaâ€, fir mein kehta chill maar and tu kehta tha ki darr nhi raha, mein to chill hu!
Kabhi kabhi thoda darr bhi liya karo bhayia ji!
Ola se Jaguar jump maarlo, fir jaguar ko ola bana ke chal wana! LOL!
Bandi patao (no serious relationship), paise udo, aish karo!
author: Aditya  Raghuwanshi

text:
I know ki mere memoir you will be expecting â€œsome thingsâ€ but chill maar nahi hai kuch.
Tumhare wo disturbing habits: light jalake sona, har 30 min m alarm bajna (during night) and the worst, cold drink flat karke pina, ye sab kafi yaad ayengi and hopefully change ho jayengi. (Jese simple code ko complex tareeke se likhna change ho gaya)
Wo apne long discussions about future plans & wo long DEBATES in which I always WON (like â€œki brush khaane se pehle kare ya khaane ke baad chahiye?â€, which I clearly WON) sab yaad rahenge.
Mene tumse (movies + snacks) ki habit leli h, so now it is something we can "agree" on.
Thanks for staying in hospital that night, jab mujhe kuch nahi hua tha! LOL (HC sucks)!
You are the only person who has not tasted GPL even once. You will regret that!
Wo apna 10 year challenge yaad rakhna BBQ wala, wo to epic hoga!
Acha ha, mere paas wo video bhi h jisme tum â€œreverse-escalators raceâ€ m proudly aa rahe the!
And ha ek trip karte h ye pandemic ke baad, I have realised ki mein kabhi nahi pi skta!
And trip se pehle apna â€œuncle-typeâ€ style change kar lena!

PS: Sarthak gurgan aa raha h, to iss bahane tumhara gurgaon aana to pakka hoga and milna bhi ho jayega! (Ye important tha)
author: Aditya  Raghuwanshi

text:
Baate shuru karne se pehle thodi tipadi apki bio pe karli jaye.
â€œAn ingenious personâ€, which means original or creative, jabki ye pura bio net se utha ke likha h.
â€œsimplifying lives by vulgarizing complex thingsâ€, bhai tera complex bio hi iss baat ko contradict kar raha h.
â€œI won't let you forget meâ€, ab ye thoda specific logo ke liye h, naam lene ki jarurat nahi h I think. 
â€œI have made some incredible friends for life at IITKâ€, this is the best part.
Yaad h jab hum prof ke paas project maangne gaye the (KALDI). And wo matka (ya PhD) jisko prof ke ghar ke saam se fursat nahi thi. Aaj takk kaldi tools nhi install kar paya hoga. ğŸ˜‚
I know ki tum kaafi dukhi ho ki dono param & sarthak delhi ke paas h and tum bangalore, but donâ€™t worry that bond will never break.
Hospital tumne nahi, HC ne pahunch aya tha (HC sucks), Thoda tension kam liya karo!
Placements bhi chaape h, puri preparation krke, saare tests deke, PPO accept kar liya!
You have grown a lot in both mentality and the skills, you have made your family proud, and ab to PAWRI karo!

PS: Delhi milne aao, sarthak & param tumhara wait karenge!
author: Aditya  Raghuwanshi

text:
Ye akela bhai h mera jo wakanda se ... 
Bina oximeter sirf haath lagake ke pulse rate mesaure karne ka tech wahi se mil skta h!
Par sahi m, tune bhot dimaag chaate h logo ke ... log kaapte h tumhare naam se LOL

Ubuntu install karna mujhse acha tumhe hi aata h (Windows udaa ke)
You have a unique (chutiya) personality, jo saalo yaad rahegi, Black Panther ka replacement h tu
Par tune college se jaate time BT nhi hone di, thanks for that

Tu bhot chaape ga future m, bhul matt jana mujhe!
author: Aditya  Raghuwanshi

text:
Company change karli param ke liye, itna pyaar h, sahi h ab mera param se bhi milna ho jayega!
Tumhare paas wo special power h, lec m jaha baithoge uske charo taraf hariyali hi aa jati h! Psychology m presentation procrastinate bohot ki humne!
Yaad h psy endsem m hamare alag ans the ek ques ka fir bhi dono ka sahi tha.
Fir aaya thermodynamics, jisme prof aniket ko scold karte the har baar, chaahe koi baat kar raha ho!
Tumne instagram celebs (both female & male) ko stalk karne ke liye kiya tha! *Anaya Pandey*
Kai horror movies dekhi h room par, ek m to tu bhi chilla diya tha!
Tumne non-veg khana shuru nahi kiya h, wo mein kara dunga gurgaon m!
Tower ki HR bandi h, to param ki bhi jarurat nahi padegi!
Acha ha, gurgaon aane se pehle apni bachpann hui shaadi se divorce le lena, legally karne saare kaam!
â€œChote bheemâ€ ho tum, success to mil jayega, chutki ko patalo bas! ğŸ˜‚
Kaliya ke patane se pehle ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚
PS: Ab to gurgaon m miloge, paise kharchne m problem to batana help kar dunga acche se!
author: Aditya  Raghuwanshi
